channel.title: Helicopters on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in Helicopters on Game6r

item.title: Game Shooting Helicopters
item.description: During the game Shooting Helicopters you will control a combat rotorcraft, performing command tasks. You are armed with laser weapons, but you can additionally buy yourself a rapid-fire machine gun, rocket launcher and even a flamethrower. The task is to destroy the accumulation of enemy equipment and defeat the base where the main enemy troops are concentrated.

item.title: Helicopter game
item.description: Helicopters game gives you the opportunity to control a small toy rotorcraft, which, despite its size, is able to perform quite complex tasks and even perform all sorts of tricks in the air. Of course, in order to perform maneuvers, certain skills will be required, albeit less than for flying on a real large helicopter, but without practice, the gamer will definitely have difficulties. The Helicopter game sets you the task of guiding the rotorcraft along a very complex trajectory.
